examples.example: 妈妈买了好多新鲜的青菜，准备为我们做一顿美味又营养的晚餐。

translate.english: Mother bought a lot of fresh green vegetables and is prepared to make a delicious and nutritious dinner for us.

examples.example: 我今天去菜市场买了些青菜，准备做一道清爽可口的菜肴。

translate.english: I went to the food market to buy some green vegetables today and am going to prepare a refreshing and delicious dish.

examples.example: 我喜欢在自己的小菜园里种各种各样的青菜，享受收获的喜悦。

translate.english: I like to plant all kinds of green vegetables in my own small vegetable garden and enjoy the joy of harvest.
